item.description: New Website To increase our visibility, we have launched a new website (which you have obviously already found) using the Hello Friend NG Hugo theme, with some slight tweaks. Goals With this new platform, we aim to provide a convenient, centralised location for all your Rchaeological needs, from general R resources for beginners, to more advanced R topics in archaeology and related disciplines. We will offer occasional posts on various topics on a completely unpredictable schedule.
item.content:
New Website

To increase our visibility, we have launched a new website (which you have obviously already found) using the Hello Friend NG Hugo theme, with some slight tweaks.

Goals

With this new platform, we aim to provide a convenient, centralised location for all your Rchaeological needs, from general R resources for beginners, to more advanced R topics in archaeology and related disciplines.

We will offer occasional posts on various topics on a completely unpredictable schedule. You can subscribe to our RSS feed here.

Contribute

You can contribute to the website via the GitHub repository.

To learn more, visit the about page.
